DOC.brief_title: Effect New Infant Cereal Weight Gain
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , control , randomize , prospective , parallel-group , double-blind study evaluate effect new infant cereal supplement prebiotics , probiotic , vegetable protein special blend starch weight gain intestinal microbiota healthy infant 6 12 moth age . Patients randomize receive either new infant cereal standard cereal .
DOC.criteria: Lactating baby 6 month age Informed consent sign parent Malformations , diseases condition may alter development and/or nutritional status Born extremely preterm ( < 32 week gestational age )
